question: Thymoquinone is ineffective against radiation induced enteritis, yes or no?
ideal_answer: No, Thymoquinone has been found to be effective against radiation induced enteritis

snippets.text: n this study, we found that thymoquinone (TQ) could mitigate intestinal damages induced by irradiation.
